page.title: 04OUR SPARE TIME
page.content: we surveyed 200 households about their daily newspapers.here are the results: 58 Mirror 53 Sun 36 Star 30 dont read one 20 Express 7 Mail 5 Telegraph 2 Guardian 2 Daily Record When asked-do you read a local newspaper. 149 read Times + Star (weekly) 44 read Evening news +star (daily) 4 read Cumberland news (Carlisle paper). these figures indicate that some people read more than one newspaper. We surveyed 100 families in our area and their favourite sports are as follows: ASS Football 33 Rugby L/U 29 Swimming 27 Running 20 Cricket 15 Squash 14 Snooker 13 Pool 10
